name: places/ChIJy8WWb_31wokRkrfsnCzwnnQ
formattedAddress: 403 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 403 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029-1603, USA

originalText.text: 9yrs 3 different apartments and I honestly couldn’t have asked for a better renting experience in the city. I came to this family owned agency with two roommates who knew nothing about the city but had heard the horror stories of surviving here while trying to make things happen professionally. They are very hands on with each building they operate. When problems or concerns would arise they were available by text or call and responded promptly. As a single occupancy tenant Crystal was more than supportive as I transitioned from having roommates to living alone. During the pandemic they prioritized tenant safety and kept communication open. I only moved to for personal and professional growth and not only did they understood that but let me know I was always welcomed to come back.

originalText.text:
Customer service was unprofessional. I called about a one bedroom apartment showing this morning - no one picked up.

Someone called me back an hour and half later and asked “who is this…?” (Remember she called me). I told her I’m interested in an apartment and proceeded to tell me the apartment is off the market. It felt as if I irritated her when I was simply making an inquiry about apartments.

originalText.text: The Pisacanos are wonderful and worked a miracle to help me rent a lovely apartment in one of their very well maintained buildings. They are trusted members of the community and professionals in the most personable manner.

text.text: The Pisacanos are wonderful and worked a miracle to help me rent a lovely apartment in one of their very well maintained buildings. They are trusted members of the community and professionals in the most personable manner.

originalText.text:
In my experience this company is highly unprofessional. Be careful speaking with management as they will attempt to scare you with lawyers. They will berate you and attack you for any issue you come up to them with especially the father he is a bitter old man that will verbally attack your wife but never the man of the house.

Ive had 2 apartments with this company. Most common issue i had was with their heating issues. Ive had a hamster freeze to death because they did not address the issue. They finally addressed it after I called 311. This was 3 weeks later.

On a funny note if a landlord tells you im not a slumlord then start running away asap! Wish I did.

I would stay away from this one.

originalText.text:
Where to begin? :) I cannot recommend Pisacano Realty enough! This is a family business with James Sr. James Jr. and angel on earth Crystal Pisacano. This family is honest, hard working and they own/lease several buildings in East Harlem and Manhathan.

We lived in Pisacano for 3 years and the management is phenomenal! If every we had any kind of maintenance request they were handled without delay and thoroughly!! Crystal is firm but accommodating and so helpful!

Please rent from them and know you are in great hands!
